structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Recognizance; Filing; Proceedings On Breach Of Condition
law.text: Such recognizance shall be filed of record in the superior court for the county, and, upon a breach of the condition thereof, the proceedings shall be as provided in chapter two hundred and seventy-five relative to recognizances to keep the peace and be of good behavior.
